mapper.select:
select p.NAME,P.SEX,P.DATE_OF_BIRTH,p.PHONE_NUMBER_HOME,t.PAT_AGE, t.patient_id,t.visit_id,t.dept_admission_to,t.admission_date_time, t.dept_discharge_from,t.discharge_date_time,t.occupation,t.marital_status, t.identity,t.armed_services,t.duty,t.unit_in_contract,t.charge_type, t.working_status,t.insurance_type,t.insurance_no,t.service_agency, t.mailing_address,t.patient_class,t.admission_cause,t.pat_adm_condition, t.consulting_doctor,t.admitted_by,t.serious_cond_days,t.discharge_disposition, t.total_costs,t.total_payments,t.catalog_date,t.cataloger,t.catalog_writer, t.health_level,t.mr_infect_report,t.infect_indicator,t.identity_class,t.chief_doctor, t.advanced_studies_doctor,t.practice_doctor_of_graduate,t.practice_doctor, t.in_dept_name,t.in_clinic_attr,t.in_outp_or_inp,t.in_internal_or_sergery, t.out_dept_name,t.out_clinic_attr,t.out_outp_or_inp,t.out_internal_or_sergery, t.settle_indi,t.link_date,t.NGROUPNUM,t.ISORDERCHECK,t.expert_id,t.ISCHECKTRUE, t.ATTENDING_DOCTOR ,m.RS_DRUG_TYPES ,n.DIAGNOSIS_DESC,nvl(N.DIAGNOSIS_COUNT,0) DIAGNOSIS_COUNT from pat_visit t left join pat_master_index p on t.patient_id = p.patient_id
inner
left
join ( select NGROUPNUM,listagg( RS_DRUG_TYPE ,'@;@') within GROUP (order by NGROUPNUM) RS_DRUG_TYPES from ( select NGROUPNUM,RS_DRUG_TYPE from RS_DRUG_CHECKRSLT
where RS_DRUG_TYPE = #{pd.RS_DRUG_TYPE}
group by NGROUPNUM,RS_DRUG_TYPE ) group by NGROUPNUM ) m on (t.NGROUPNUM=m.NGROUPNUM )
inner
left
join ( select PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ID,count(DIAGNOSIS_DESC) DIAGNOSIS_COUNT,listagg(DIAGNOSIS_DESC,'@;@') within GROUP (order by PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ID) DIAGNOSIS_DESC from diagnosis
where DIAGNOSIS_DESC LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.DIAGNOSIS_DESC}),'%')
group by PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ID )n on (t.patient_id = n.patient_id and t.VISIT_ID=n.VISIT_ID ) where 1=1
and t.OUT_DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.OUT_DEPT_NAME}),'%')
and t.ATTENDING_DOCTOR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.ATTENDING_DOCTOR}),'%')
and t.discharge_date_time >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.discharge_date_time < to_date(#{pd.endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.IS_OPERATION = #{pd.IS_OPERATION}
and t.ISORDERCHECK = #{pd.ISORDERCHECK}
and ( t.ISCHECKTRUE =2 or t.ISCHECKTRUE is null )
and t.ISCHECKTRUE = #{pd.ISCHECKTRUE }
Order by t.discharge_date_time

select p.NAME, P.SEX, P.DATE_OF_BIRTH, p.PHONE_NUMBER_HOME, t.patient_id, trunc(t.discharge_date_time) - trunc(t.admission_date_time) + 1 dayCount , t.PAT_AGE, t.visit_id, t.dept_admission_to, t.admission_date_time, t.dept_discharge_from, t.discharge_date_time, t.occupation, t.marital_status, t.identity, t.armed_services, t.duty, t.unit_in_contract, t.charge_type, t.working_status, t.insurance_type, t.insurance_no, t.service_agency, t.mailing_address, t.patient_class, t.admission_cause, t.pat_adm_condition, t.consulting_doctor, t.admitted_by, t.serious_cond_days, t.discharge_disposition, t.total_costs, t.total_payments, t.catalog_date, t.cataloger, t.catalog_writer, t.health_level, t.mr_infect_report, t.infect_indicator, t.identity_class, t.chief_doctor, t.advanced_studies_doctor, t.practice_doctor_of_graduate, t.practice_doctor, t.in_dept_name, t.in_clinic_attr, t.in_outp_or_inp, t.in_internal_or_sergery, t.out_dept_name, t.out_clinic_attr, t.out_outp_or_inp, t.out_internal_or_sergery, t.settle_indi, t.link_date, t.NGROUPNUM, t.ISORDERCHECK, t.ISCHECKTRUE, t.expert_id ,n.DIAGNOSIS_DESC,nvl(N.DIAGNOSIS_COUNT,0) from pat_visit t left join pat_master_index p on t.patient_id = p.patient_id left join ( select PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ID,count(DIAGNOSIS_DESC) DIAGNOSIS_COUNT,listagg(DIAGNOSIS_DESC,';') within GROUP (order by PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ID) DIAGNOSIS_DESC from diagnosis where patient_id =#{pd.patient_id} and visit_id = #{pd.visit_id} group by PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ID )n on (t.patient_id = n.patient_id and t.VISIT_ID=n.VISIT_ID ) where t.patient_id =#{pd.patient_id} and t.visit_id = #{pd.visit_id}
select * from pat_visit t where t.patient_id =#{patient_id} and t.visit_id = #{visit_id}
mapper.update: update pat_visit t set expert_id=#{expert_id} where t.patient_id =#{patient_id} and t.visit_id = #{visit_id}
mapper.select: select * from pat_visit t left join pat_master_index m on m.patient_id = t.patient_id where t.discharge_date_time >= to_date(#{beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.discharge_date_time < to_date(#{endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')

delete rs_drug_checkrslt where ngroupnum in ( select t.ngroupnum from pat_visit t where t.discharge_date_time >= to_date(#{beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.discharge_date_time < to_date(#{endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and ngroupnum is not null )
